meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being right-handed or left-handed.
meanings.sent1: Her handednesses were evident when she wrote with her left hand.
meanings.sent2: His handednesses were clear when he played tennis with his dominant hand.
meanings.sent3: In a world of ambidextrous cats, his handednesses made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her handednesses in painting were like a dance of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher noticed his handednesses and encouraged him to practice writing with both hands.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of favoring one side over the other in various activities.
meanings.sent1: The soccer player's handednesses were evident in how he always kicked with his right foot.
meanings.sent2: Her handednesses in cooking showed when she always chopped vegetables with her left hand.
meanings.sent3: His handednesses in choosing a favorite color made him the odd one out in the group.
meanings.sent4: The artist's handednesses in using bold strokes created a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The child's handednesses in picking toys reflected his preference for cars over dolls.
